name: @bennyzen/mcp-color-convert
description: Convert colors across formats for seamless design-to-code workflows. Create lighter or darker variants, adjust saturation and hue, and generate palettes, schemes, and full swatch scales. Check contrast for WCAG compliance, pick readable text colors automatically, and validate color inputs with confidence.

tools.name: convert
tools.title: Color Converter
tools.description: Converts a color from one format to another. Supports all major color formats including hex, rgb, rgba, hsl, hsla, oklch, oklab with full alpha/transparency support. Input can be any valid color string (hex, rgb, rgba, hsl, hsla, oklch, oklab, or named colors like 'red', 'blue'). Alpha values are preserved when converting between alpha-supporting formats, removed when converting to non-alpha formats. Available output formats: 'hex' (#FF0000), 'rgb' (rgb(255,0,0)), 'hsl' (hsl(0,100%,50%)), 'oklch' (oklch(63.3% 0.254 19.9)), 'oklab' (oklab(0.633 0.025 0.013)). Example: convert color '#FF0000' to format 'oklch'.

color.description: The color string to convert - accepts hex (#FF0000), rgb(255,0,0), rgba(255,0,0,0.5), hsl(0,100%,50%), hsla(0,100%,50%,0.5), oklch(63.3% 0.254 19.9), oklch(63.3% 0.254 19.9 / 0.5), oklab(0.633 0.025 0.013), oklab(0.633 0.025 0.013 / 0.5), or named colors ('red', 'blue', 'green'). Alpha values supported in all applicable formats.

tools.name: lighten
tools.title: Lighten Color
tools.description: Increases the lightness of a color by a specified percentage amount. Perfect for creating lighter variations of colors for hover states, highlights, or design system variations.

color.description: The color string to lighten (e.g., '#FF0000', 'rgb(255,0,0)', 'rgba(255,0,0,0.5)', 'hsl(0,100%,50%)', 'hsla(0,100%,50%,0.5)', 'oklch(63.3% 0.254 19.9 / 0.5)', 'oklab(0.633 0.025 0.013 / 0.5)'). Supports all formats including alpha variants.

amount.description: The amount to increase lightness by (0-100). For example, 10 makes the color 10% lighter.

tools.name: darken
tools.title: Darken Color
tools.description: Decreases the lightness of a color by a specified percentage amount. Ideal for creating darker variations for active states, shadows, or depth in design systems.

color.description: The color string to darken (e.g., '#FF0000', 'rgb(255,0,0)', 'rgba(255,0,0,0.5)', 'hsl(0,100%,50%)', 'hsla(0,100%,50%,0.5)', 'oklch(63.3% 0.254 19.9 / 0.5)', 'oklab(0.633 0.025 0.013 / 0.5)'). Supports all formats including alpha variants.

amount.description: The amount to decrease lightness by (0-100). For example, 10 makes the color 10% darker.

tools.name: saturate
tools.title: Saturate Color
tools.description: Increases the saturation (intensity/vibrancy) of a color by a specified percentage amount. Use this to make colors more vivid and eye-catching.

color.description: The color string to saturate (e.g., '#FF0000', 'rgb(255,0,0)', 'rgba(255,0,0,0.5)', 'hsl(0,100%,50%)', 'hsla(0,100%,50%,0.5)', 'oklch(63.3% 0.254 19.9 / 0.5)', 'oklab(0.633 0.025 0.013 / 0.5)'). Supports all formats including alpha variants.

amount.description: The amount to increase saturation by (0-100). For example, 20 makes the color 20% more saturated.

tools.name: desaturate
tools.title: Desaturate Color
tools.description: Decreases the saturation (intensity/vibrancy) of a color by a specified percentage amount. Perfect for creating muted tones, subtle backgrounds, or less prominent UI elements.

color.description: The color string to desaturate (e.g., '#FF0000', 'rgb(255,0,0)', 'rgba(255,0,0,0.5)', 'hsl(0,100%,50%)', 'hsla(0,100%,50%,0.5)', 'oklch(63.3% 0.254 19.9 / 0.5)', 'oklab(0.633 0.025 0.013 / 0.5)'). Supports all formats including alpha variants.

amount.description: The amount to decrease saturation by (0-100). For example, 20 makes the color 20% less saturated.

tools.name: rotate
tools.title: Rotate Color Hue
tools.description: Rotates the hue of a color by specified degrees around the color wheel. Perfect for creating color harmonies, analogous colors, or systematic color variations.

color.description: The color string to rotate (e.g., '#FF0000', 'rgb(255,0,0)', 'rgba(255,0,0,0.5)', 'hsl(0,100%,50%)', 'hsla(0,100%,50%,0.5)', 'oklch(63.3% 0.254 19.9 / 0.5)', 'oklab(0.633 0.025 0.013 / 0.5)'). Supports all formats including alpha variants.

degrees.description: The number of degrees to rotate the hue (0-360). Positive values rotate clockwise, negative counter-clockwise. For example, 180 creates the complementary color.

tools.name: luminance
tools.title: Get Color Luminance
tools.description: Calculates the WCAG relative brightness of a color (0-1 scale, where 0 is pure black and 1 is pure white). Critical for accessibility compliance and determining if colors are light or dark.

color.description: The color string to analyze (e.g., '#FF0000', 'rgb(255,0,0)', 'rgba(255,0,0,0.5)', 'hsl(0,100%,50%)', 'hsla(0,100%,50%,0.5)', 'oklch(63.3% 0.254 19.9 / 0.5)', 'oklab(0.633 0.025 0.013 / 0.5)'). Supports all formats including alpha variants.

tools.name: chroma
tools.title: Get Color Chroma
tools.description: Calculates the chroma (color intensity/purity) of a color (0-1 scale, where 0 is grayscale and 1 is maximum intensity). Useful for understanding color vibrancy and saturation levels.

color.description: The color string to analyze (e.g., '#FF0000', 'rgb(255,0,0)', 'rgba(255,0,0,0.5)', 'hsl(0,100%,50%)', 'hsla(0,100%,50%,0.5)', 'oklch(63.3% 0.254 19.9 / 0.5)', 'oklab(0.633 0.025 0.013 / 0.5)'). Supports all formats including alpha variants.

tools.name: opacity
tools.title: Get Color Opacity
tools.description: Extracts the opacity/alpha value from any color format (0-1 scale, where 0 is fully transparent and 1 is fully opaque). Works with rgba, hsla, oklch, oklab, and any format that supports transparency. Essential for working with transparent colors and overlays.

color.description: The color string to analyze (e.g., '#FF0000', 'rgb(255,0,0)', 'hsl(0,100%,50%)', 'rgba(255,0,0,0.5)', 'hsla(0,100%,50%,0.5)', 'oklch(63.3% 0.254 19.9 / 0.5)', 'oklab(0.633 0.025 0.013 / 0.5)'). Works with any color format that supports transparency.

tools.name: name
tools.title: Get Color Name
tools.description: Attempts to identify the common name of a color. Returns the color name if recognizable (e.g., 'red', 'blue', 'forestgreen'), otherwise returns the hex code. Useful for user-friendly color identification.

tools.name: palette
tools.title: Generate Color Palette
tools.description: Generates a harmonious color palette from a base color. Creates 6 evenly spaced colors around the color wheel. Perfect for creating color schemes, themes, or design system foundations.

type.description: Optional palette type: 'default' (rainbow-style) or 'monochromatic' (same hue, varying lightness). Defaults to 'default'.

color.description: The base color to generate palette from (e.g., '#FF0000', 'rgb(255,0,0)', 'rgba(255,0,0,0.5)', 'hsl(0,100%,50%)', 'hsla(0,100%,50%,0.5)', 'oklch(63.3% 0.254 19.9 / 0.5)', 'oklab(0.633 0.025 0.013 / 0.5)'). Supports all formats including alpha variants.

tools.name: scheme
tools.title: Generate Color Scheme
tools.description: Generates specific color harmonies from a base color. Supports complementary, triadic, tetradic, and other classic color theory relationships. Essential for creating balanced, professional color combinations.

type.description: Scheme type: 'complementary' (2 colors), 'triadic' (3 colors), 'tetradic' (4 colors), 'analogous' (adjacent colors), or 'split-complementary'.

color.description: The base color to generate scheme from (e.g., '#FF0000', 'rgb(255,0,0)', 'rgba(255,0,0,0.5)', 'hsl(0,100%,50%)', 'hsla(0,100%,50%,0.5)', 'oklch(63.3% 0.254 19.9 / 0.5)', 'oklab(0.633 0.025 0.013 / 0.5)'). Supports all formats including alpha variants.

tools.name: swatch
tools.title: Generate Color Swatch
tools.description: Creates a complete 11-shade swatch from a base color (50, 100, 200...950). This is the industry standard for design systems like Tailwind CSS. Perfect for creating consistent light-to-dark variations.

color.description: The base color to generate swatch from (e.g., '#FF0000', 'rgb(255,0,0)', 'rgba(255,0,0,0.5)', 'hsl(0,100%,50%)', 'hsla(0,100%,50%,0.5)', 'oklch(63.3% 0.254 19.9 / 0.5)', 'oklab(0.633 0.025 0.013 / 0.5)'). Supports all formats including alpha variants.

maxLightness.description: Optional maximum lightness cap (0-1, default: 0.95). Prevents shades from becoming too light.

minLightness.description: Optional minimum lightness floor (0-1, default: 0.05). Prevents shades from becoming too dark.

lightnessFactor.description: Optional multiplier for lightness adjustments (default: 1.0). Higher values create more contrast between shades.

tools.name: random
tools.title: Generate Random Color
tools.description: Generates a random color in the specified format. Useful for testing, prototyping, or when you need inspiration for new color choices.

format.description: Optional format for the random color: 'hex', 'rgb', 'hsl', 'oklch', 'oklab'. Defaults to 'hex'.

tools.name: contrast
tools.title: Calculate Color Contrast
tools.description: Calculates the WCAG contrast ratio between two colors (1-21 scale, where higher values mean better contrast). Essential for accessibility compliance - AA requires 4.5:1 for normal text, AAA requires 7:1.

background.description: The background color (e.g., '#FFFFFF', 'rgb(255,255,255)', 'rgba(255,255,255,0.8)', 'hsl(0,0%,100%)', 'hsla(0,0%,100%,0.8)', 'oklch(100% 0 0 / 0.8)', 'oklab(1 0 0 / 0.8)'). Supports all formats including alpha variants.

foreground.description: The foreground/text color (e.g., '#000000', 'rgb(0,0,0)', 'rgba(0,0,0,0.8)', 'hsl(0,0%,0%)', 'hsla(0,0%,0%,0.8)', 'oklch(0% 0 0 / 0.8)', 'oklab(0 0 0 / 0.8)'). Supports all formats including alpha variants.

tools.name: compare
tools.title: WCAG Color Compliance Analysis
tools.description: Performs comprehensive WCAG accessibility analysis between two colors. Returns contrast ratio, compliance levels (AA/AAA), and recommendations. Critical for ensuring your color combinations meet accessibility standards.

background.description: The background color to analyze (e.g., '#FFFFFF', 'rgb(255,255,255)', 'rgba(255,255,255,0.8)', 'hsl(0,0%,100%)', 'hsla(0,0%,100%,0.8)', 'oklch(100% 0 0 / 0.8)', 'oklab(1 0 0 / 0.8)'). Supports all formats including alpha variants.

foreground.description: The foreground/text color to analyze (e.g., '#000000', 'rgb(0,0,0)', 'rgba(0,0,0,0.8)', 'hsl(0,0%,0%)', 'hsla(0,0%,0%,0.8)', 'oklch(0% 0 0 / 0.8)', 'oklab(0 0 0 / 0.8)'). Supports all formats including alpha variants.

tools.name: text_color
tools.title: Get Optimal Text Color
tools.description: Determines the best text color (black or white) for maximum readability on a given background color. Automatically calculates which provides better contrast. Perfect for dynamic UI elements with variable backgrounds.

background.description: The background color to analyze (e.g., '#FF0000', 'rgb(255,0,0)', 'rgba(255,0,0,0.5)', 'hsl(0,100%,50%)', 'hsla(0,100%,50%,0.5)', 'oklch(63.3% 0.254 19.9 / 0.5)', 'oklab(0.633 0.025 0.013 / 0.5)'). Supports all formats including alpha variants.

tools.name: is_valid_color
tools.title: Validate Color
tools.description: Checks if a color string is valid and parseable. Supports hex, rgb, hsl, oklab, oklch formats, and named colors. Essential for input validation and error handling.

color.description: The color string to validate (e.g., '#FF0000', 'rgb(255,0,0)', 'rgba(255,0,0,0.5)', 'hsl(0,100%,50%)', 'hsla(0,100%,50%,0.5)', 'oklch(63.3% 0.254 19.9 / 0.5)', 'oklab(0.633 0.025 0.013 / 0.5)', 'red', 'invalidcolor'). Supports all formats including alpha variants.
